description: This Kotlin source file defines the NotesViewModel class, which manages UI-related data for notes in an Android application. It initializes the repository, handles search queries, and provides methods to manipulate notes through coroutines.

classes.name: NotesViewModel
classes.description: ViewModel class that provides data and handles logic for notes, including search functionality, insertion, and deletion.

methods.name: setSearchQuery
methods.description: Updates the search query used to filter notes.

methods.name: upsert
methods.description: Inserts or updates a note asynchronously.
